titleStmt.title: The generall junto or The councell of union, chosen equally out of England, Scotland, and Ireland, for the better compacting of three nations into one monarchy, &c.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Henry, 1604-1652.

notesStmt.note: Annotations on Thomason copy: [on recto of fly leaf]: "NB. The Generall Junto by Hen Parker Esq. A Declaration Concerning ye Generall Accompts of ye Kingdome [illegible] the nature & necessitie of them stated [illegible, folowed by a flourish]"; "The Generall Junto but fifty of them printed at the Charge of Sr John Danvers & never to be sold but given to particular friends"; "N:11 of 24 [crossed out] 12 Fb".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
